values: 警觉的；机敏的；警惕的；留心的；机灵的；注意的；灵敏的；敏捷的
警报；警示；警戒状态；提醒；警觉；预警；提示信号；警惕；戒备状态；戒备
警告；提醒；通知；使意识到；使认识到；使警觉；使注意

word_group.brief_definition: 红色警报；红色警戒；红色预警
警戒状态；警觉状态；戒备状态
全面戒备；全部警戒；全员戒备状态
高温警报；高温橙色警报；橙色高温预警
增长的警惕心；加强的警戒状态

bilingual.source: The emergency alert was relayed to all residents.
bilingual.target: 紧急警报被转发给了所有居民。

bilingual.source: The fire department issued an alert about the wildfire.
bilingual.target: 消防部门发布了关于野火的警报。

bilingual.source: The app sends an alert when your battery is low.
bilingual.target: 当你的电池电量低时，应用程序会发送警报。

bilingual.source: The weather service issued an alert for severe thunderstorms.
bilingual.target: 气象服务发布了严重雷暴的警报。

bilingual.source: The government issued an alert for a potential terrorist threat.
bilingual.target: 政府发布了潜在恐怖威胁的警报。

bilingual.source: This motion detector will alert when someone passes by.
bilingual.target: 这个运动检测器会在有人经过时发出警报。

bilingual.source: The bank's system triggered an alert due to suspicious activity.
bilingual.target: 由于可疑活动，银行系统触发了警报。

bilingual.source: The security system triggered an alert when it detected movement.
bilingual.target: 安全系统在检测到移动时触发了警报。

bilingual.source: A modal alert will appear if you enter incorrect information.
bilingual.target: 如果你输入错误信息，将会出现模态警报。

bilingual.source: The fire alert went off in the middle of the night.

list.abstract: alert是HTML DOM 中用到的一种脚本语言，它的中文意思是“提醒”。它是JavaScript或VBscript脚本语言中窗口window对象的一个常用方法；其主要用法就是在你自己定义了一定的函数以后，通过执行相应的操作，所弹出对话框的语言。并且alert对话框通常用于一些对用户的提示信息。
alert，英语单词，名词、动词、形容词，作名词时意为“警戒，警惕；警报；警戒期；（电子设备的）提示信号；(Alert)（美、德、俄、西、印）阿莱尔特（人名）”，作动词时意为“ 使警觉，警告；使意识到”，作形容词时意为“警惕的，警觉的；机警的，机敏的；充分意识到的”。

yingyinNormal.en: FBI was on high alert. They investigated every threat. Calm down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 联调局之前高度戒备，他们调查每个威胁，冷静。

yingyinNormal.en: My fear of him keeps me alert. Tending to his needs gives my life purpose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对他的恐惧让我时刻保持警惕，要满足他的各种需要，也让我有点事做。

yingyinNormal.en: All very interesting, Sherlock, but the terror alert has been raised to critical.
yingyinNormal.zh: 都很有意思，夏洛克，但恐怖袭击预警等级已达到"危急"。

yingyinNormal.en: We have an unsanctioned departure from bay two. Alert General Hux. And stop that fighter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第二停机场有一架战机未经许可起飞。通知赫克斯将军 并阻止那艘战机。

yingyinNormal.en: Is it possible your blood sugar was low? I was rested, alert and completely aware of my surroundings.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的血糖有可能偏低吗？我精神饱满，思维敏锐，对周围环境了如指掌。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow. Okay, dude, alert. And who is this guy? Mike Gandolf Ganderson, only like the funnest guy in the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，兄弟，请注意，这个人是谁？麦克甘道夫，世界上最爆笑的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, good! Okay, yes, I'm gonna do that. I'm calling him. If it helps, I can alert my magician contacts in Vegas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，我这就找他，我打给他。要是有用，我可以找我在赌城的魔术师朋友。

yingyinNormal.en: They have another 10 months on their trip home. Space travel is dangerous, they need to be alert and undistracted.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们还有10个月的航程回家，太空旅行很危险，他们需要警觉且不能分心。

yingyinNormal.en: If people buy what you're saying, they will buy what you're selling. Max, stay alert. This could go to cult like that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果人们愿意对你说的话买账，他们也会对你推销的东西买账。麦克斯，提高警戒，一不小心这就变邪教了。

yingyinNormal.en: Civilians. Hundreds of them. We can save their lives. I'll phone Denniston's office so that he can alert the Admiralty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人们。成百上千的民众，我们可以拯救他们。我要打电话到丹尼斯顿的办公室，他可以告诉海军部。

yingyinNormal.en: So, let's go learn how hydroelectric power might not be the environmental bargain you think it is. Sorry. Spoiler alert.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，我们就去看看水力发电，也许不是你想的那么环保。抱歉，剧透了。

yingyinNormal.en: As you can tell, I am alert, extroverted, affable and articulate. Of course. And not to mention devilishly handsome. Not to mention?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你也能看出，我机敏，外向，亲切，思维清晰，当然了，更不用提如此帅气逼人。真的不是故意提到嘛？

yingyinNormal.en: Sensor alert. Front door. Please state your name. Colonel Hyrum Graff, Director of Training, International Fleet. This is my colleague, Major Anderson. May We?
yingyinNormal.zh: 传感器报警，前门，请告知您的姓名。希伦·格拉夫上校，国际舰队训练部主管，这是我的同事安德森少校，我们能进来吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: quick to see, understand, and act in a particular situation

examination_example.sentence: Stay <highlight>alert</highlight> to serious symptoms, such as chest pain, severe shortness of breath or dizziness, or faintness, and seek medical attention immediately.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对严重症状保持警惕，如胸痛、严重气短、头晕或昏厥，并立即就医。

sense_info_list.en:
make someone aware of something; 
aware of something, especially a problem or danger

examination_example.sentence: Jealousy and anger, for example, may have evolved to <highlight>alert</highlight> us to important inequalities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，嫉妒和愤怒可能是为了提醒我们注意重要的不平等现象而进化的。

sense_info_list.en: a warning to people to be prepared to deal with something dangerous

word_usage.usage:
alert常用作表语，后接介词in或to，表示“对...保持警惕”。例：
Schools need to be constantly alert to this problem.
各学校对此问题应该始终保持警惕。

alert是及物动词，常接名词或代词作宾语；alert也接双宾语，其直接宾语多为that引导的从句。alert还可接以动词不定式充当补足语的复合宾语。例：
We will alert operating personnel to repair.
我们将通知操作人员去维修。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 提醒注意; 使意识到; 意识到
警戒的; 警戒状态; 使警戒

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adj. 警惕的；警觉的；机警的；机敏的；机灵的

sense_info_list.en:
make someone aware of something; 
aware of something, especially a problem or danger
sense_info_list.zh: 提醒注意; 使意识到; 意识到

examination_example.sentence: In 2016 the Air Force had to issue 3,995,874 warnings to satellite owners <highlight>alerting</highlight> them to a potential nearby threat from another satellite.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 空军在2016年不得不向卫星拥有者发出3,995,874条警告，提醒他们附近另一颗卫星的潜在威胁。

examination_example.sentence: For example, fear can <highlight>alert</highlight> us to possible danger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，恐惧可以提醒我们可能的危险。

examination_example.sentence: Their behaviors—drinking too much alcohol, using illegal drugs, smoking cigarettes and skipping school—can <highlight>alert</highlight> parents and teachers that serious problems are brewing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的行为——酗酒、使用非法药物、吸烟和逃学——可以提醒家长和老师，严重的问题正在酝酿之中。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>alert</highlight> American workers to the urgency for adaptation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提醒美国工人适应的紧迫性。

sense_info_list.zh: 警戒的; 警戒状态; 使警戒

examination_example.sentence: In 2016 the Air Force had to issue 3,995,874 warnings to satellite owners <highlight>alerting</highlight> them to a potential nearby threat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2016年，空军不得不向卫星所有者发出3995874次警告，提醒他们附近存在潜在威胁。

examination_example.sentence: Half of your brain stays <highlight>alert</highlight> and prepared for danger when you sleep in a new place, a study has revealed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项研究显示，当你在一个新的地方睡觉时，你的一半大脑保持警觉，为危险做好准备。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers explained that the study demonstrated when we are in a novel environment the brain partly remains <highlight>alert</highlight> so that humans can defend themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员解释说，这项研究表明，当我们处于一个新的环境中时，大脑部分保持警惕，以便人类能够保护自己。

sense_info_list.en: a warning of danger or of a problem

examination_example.sentence: Paris prosecutor Remy Heitz said that an initial fire <highlight>alert</highlight> was sounded at 6:20 pm on Monday evening but no fire was found.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巴黎检察官Remy Heitz表示，周一晚上6点20分发出了最初的火灾警报，但没有发现火灾。

examination_example.sentence: The second <highlight>alert</highlight> was sounded at 6:43 pm, and the blaze was discovered on the roof.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第二次警报于下午6:43响起，在屋顶上发现了大火。

sense_info_list.en: able to think clearly; intellectually active

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The research team say they believe the "<highlight>alert</highlight>-but-passive" nature of television watching may be creating stress on the mind which contributes to memory decline.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该研究小组表示，看电视“警觉但被动”的本质可能会给大脑造成压力，从而导致记忆力下降。

sense_info_list.en:
make someone aware of something; 
aware of something; especially a problem or danger

examination_example.sentence: We need to be <highlight>alert</highlight> to the possible harm of violent games that could be done to children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要警惕暴力游戏可能对儿童造成的伤害。

sense_info_list.en: a warning of danger or of a problem

examination_example.sentence: Evacuate the area with the orange <highlight>alert</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用橙色警报撤离该地区。

examination_example.sentence: The transport minister advised people in parts of Scotland covered by the orange <highlight>alert</highlight> to avoid travel on Wednesday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 交通部长建议出现橙色警报的苏格兰部分地区的居民周三避免出行。

sense_info_list.en: the period during which an alert is in effect
able to think clearly; intellectually active

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
